author: MagHem
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

As a user I want that MergeCsv does not treat the content of the id column case-insensitive. An id like "Test" is not the same as "TEST" and therefore it's not a duplicate id!

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_

comments.author: doctordns
comments.body:
i am not clear on what you are asking? What did you mean by MergeCSV?  There are not cmdlets that merger CSVs.

Can you be more specific with your query?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
It sounds like you're having an issue with a custom script or module that we're not familiar with. The handling in the script or module is down to how it was coded; PowerShell can do case-sensitive comparisons just fine, if you write the code in that way. I'm going to convert this to a discussion for the time being as it looks like this pertains to something that is external to the repository. I would also highly recommend asking around community channels (e.g., https://aka.ms/psdiscord) for assistance, as the folks there may be more familiar with the module or script you happen to be working with.

title: Compare IDs case sensitive
